duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and perform complex work assignments and problem resolution in accomplishing Internal Audit and Compliance Department goals.
Provide coaching and guidance as the Auditor-in-Charge to peer auditors to ensure timeliness and quality of audit engagement process flow.
Lead operational and compliance audit engagements, including planning, fieldwork, and report writing activity.
Work with auditors and examiners during regulatory compliance examinations.
Execute processes to measure and report on the effectiveness of the bank's audit and compliance testing measures.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or other relevant field required or minimum of 4 years of related experience in auditing financial institutions. Advanced knowledge of Audit theory and practices.
